author: mmanders
msg: Updated jk_handler to check result of call to worker->get_endpoint and handle a failure.  This call can fail if the allocation for the endpoint fails because of low memory conditions causing a dereference of NULL when we try and access the endpoint.

msg: Modified code to go through a WinSock code path on NetWare if building for  Apache 2.
